english.segment1: I meant a lot in a word that I said. And I thought a lot, that word said alot. But then I ruined it, I left it out in the cold. I lost a lot because I thought a lot
english.segment2: Life doesnt always demand that we understand, Just enjoy it
english.segment3: Im starting to see it now. What it is we began, the few that we became, the person you became. And you mean a lot, so much for words to say. You mean a lot to me. You do.
english.segment4: Life doesnt always demand that we understand, That we clap our hands, But we understand that its beautiful. Today has its way of making some things new, And maybe, that means me and you. So today what Ive seen changed a part of me. When it showed me a part of you.
english.segment5: Im starting to see it now. What it is we began, the few that we became, the person you became.
